title: OH no Type Co.
comment: Oh no is my favourite type foundry by far. All of the fonts on this website are from Oh no, and I can’t wait to use more in future projects.

title: MiiR Camp Cup
comment: Fantastic mug for WFH. Keeps coffee at a drinkable temp for hours, lid prevents spills, and it’s dishwasher safe. I have two.

title: Diablo IV Lofi
comment: Not my favourite lofi ever, but the Diablo franchise has a permanent place in my heart, so this is just cool.

title: Font Review Journal
comment: A must read for font nerds. Bethany Heck’s enthusiasm for typography and design never fails to get me excited to think critically and make things.

title: The Manual
comment: A rich resource for designers. The project is on a hiatus for now, but they’ve made all their conent available for free online in the meantime.

title: Mini36 Keyboard
comment: I have the black version of this keyboard and couldn’t be happier. Definitely an endgame board for split ergo fans. You know who you are.

title: Modern Font Stacks
comment: For the projects where you’re willing to compromise on font choice to improve speed, this is super helpful.
